'''Beta 1.15.0.9''' is the second [[RenderDragon]] beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.200]], released on April 28, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360042828671|title=Minecraft with RTX Beta - 1.15.0.9 (Windows 10)|date=April 28, 2020}}</ref> which fixes some bugs. It is possible to run ray-tracing on non-RTX GPUs via a registry hack<ref>https://www.reddit.com/r/minecraftRTX/comments/hvtyy7/this_is_why_the_rtx_beta_only_runs_on_rtx_cards/</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Crash fixes.
* Items in hand look identical to the same items placed in the world.
* Sun shadows and god rays look brighter and more correct through glass.
* Performance enhancements.
* Tweaks to address the brightness at night.
* Fix for per-pixel emissives on low resolution textures.
* Fix for better looking glass in reflections.</onlyinclude>
